i1.name: Call of the Freljord
i1.target_range: <!--Range behaviour pending for test--> {{tt|1000|When damaging champions, epic monsters and structures}} / {{tt|700|When damaging large monsters}}
description: {{sbc|Innate:}} '''Nunu's''' and '''Willump's''' next instance of damage dealt to an enemy {{tip|champion}}, large {{tip|monster}} or {{tip|turrets|structure}} grants both '''Willump''' and the nearest allied champion within range ''Call of the Freljord'' for 4 seconds, prioritizing the ally with {{sti|{{as|'''highest''' attack speed}}}}.

{{sbc|Call of the Freljord:}} Gain {{sti|{{as|20% '''bonus''' attack speed}}}} and {{sti|ms|{{as|10% '''bonus''' movement speed}}}}. If '''Willump''' is affected by the buff, his {{tip|basic attack|basic attacks}} additionally splash {{as|30% AD}} {{as|physical damage}} to secondary targets in a cone in front of him.
'''Nunu''' and '''Willump''' cannot trigger ''Call of the Freljord'' from the same enemy again for a time. Successive triggers of ''Call of the Freljord'' will stack the duration.
i1.descriptionHtml:
Innate: Nunu's and Willump's next instance of damage dealt to an enemy champion, large monster or structure grants both Willump and the nearest allied champion within range Call of the Freljord for 4 seconds, prioritizing the ally with highest attack speed.
Call of the Freljord: Gain 20% bonus attack speed and 10% bonus movement speed. If Willump is affected by the buff, his basic attacks additionally splash 30% AD physical damage to secondary targets in a cone in front of him.
Nunu and Willump cannot trigger Call of the Freljord from the same enemy again for a time. Successive triggers of Call of the Freljord will stack the duration.
i1.notes:
* The splash damage will critically strike when the basic attack does, but will not deal any bonus damage.
* ''Call of the Freljord'' range to be shared with allies is based on '''Nunu''' and '''Willump's''' location.
** If no ally is prioritized based on their stats, it will be given to the one closest to them.
* Enemies that can trigger ''Call of the Freljord'' have a marker overhead.
** This marker isn't present on inhibitors or the nexus (because they cannot hold buffs and debuffs including the one that hosts this VFX), but they still trigger ''Call of the Freljord'' when attacked.

q1.name: Consume
description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Willump''' takes a bite out of the target enemy, dealing {{as|magic damage}} and {{tip|healing}} himself. The heal is increased by 50% when below {{as|{{sti|health|50% of '''maximum''' health}}}}.

Against {{tip|minions}} and {{tip|monsters}} he deals {{sti|{{as|true damage}}}} instead, and restores 25% more health. Additionally, if ''Consume'' would kill the target minion or small or medium monster, the target is {{tip|stun|stunned}} and {{tip|airborne|pulled}} towards '''Willump''' over the cast time.
q1.descriptionHtml:
Active: Willump takes a bite out of the target enemy, dealing magic damage and healing himself. The heal is increased by 50% when below 50% of maximum health.
Against minions and monsters he deals true damage instead, and restores 25% more health. Additionally, if Consume would kill the target minion or small or medium monster, the target is stunned and pulled towards Willump over the cast time.
leveling:
{{st|Champion Damage|{{ap|60 to 220}} {{as|(+ 65% AP)}} {{as|(+ 5% '''bonus''' health)}}}}
{{st|Base Healing from Champions|{{ap|75*0.8 to 215*0.8}} {{as|(+ {{ap|90*0.8}}% AP)}} {{as|(+ {{ap|10*0.8}}% '''bonus''' health)}}|Empowered Healing from Champions|{{ap|75*0.8*1.5 to 215*0.8*1.5}} {{as|(+ {{ap|90*0.8*1.5}}% AP)}} {{as|(+ {{ap|10*0.8*1.5}}% '''bonus''' health)}}}}

{{st|Non-Champion Damage|{{ap|340 to 980}}}}
{{st|Base Healing from Non-Champions|{{ap|75 to 215}} {{as|(+ 90% AP)}} {{as|(+ 10% '''bonus''' health)}}|Empowered Healing from Non-Champions|{{ap|75*1.5 to 215*1.5}} {{as|(+ {{ap|90*1.5}}% AP)}} {{as|(+ {{ap|10*1.5}}% '''bonus''' health)}}}}
q1.notes:
* Icon border glows when he is within the maximum healing threshold.
** This counts as an immobilization for triggering [[Immolate]].
* {{tip|Spell shield|Spell shields}} will block the damage and the heal.

effects.str:
• Champion Damage: (+ 65% AP) (+ 5% bonus health)

  • Base Healing from Champions: (+ % AP) (+ % bonus health)
  • Empowered Healing from Champions: (+ % AP) (+ % bonus health)

• Non-Champion Damage:

  • Base Healing from Non-Champions: (+ 90% AP) (+ 10% bonus health)
  • Empowered Healing from Non-Champions: (+ % AP) (+ % bonus health)

w1.name: Biggest Snowball Ever!
description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Willump''' {{tip|cleanse|breaks free}} of active {{tip|slow|slowing}} effects, becomes {{tip|ghosted}}, gains a slightly larger field of view, and conjures a {{ccib|Biggest Snowball Ever! Minimap.png||snowball}} that he {{tip|channel|begins rolling}} in the direction of the cursor for up to 10 seconds, increasing in power over 5 seconds, while automatically navigating his movement. The snowball increases in size over the duration. '''Willump''' can also steer the snowball with a {{tt|slow turn rate|See notes.}} that increases over time; changing direction resets the turn rate.

The duo is {{tip|slow|slowed}} by 50% for the first 1 second, but is {{tip|slow-immune}}{{tt|*|Does not affect the self-slow}} and keeps all increases in {{as|movement speed}} at time of cast for the duration of the charge. After {{tt|a delay|See notes.}}, the duo gain {{sti|ms|{{tt|{{as|14 movement speed}}|Estimated}}}} every {{fd|0.25}} seconds, up to the greater value between {{ft|{{as|'''Total''' MS + {{pp|85 to 255}}|movement speed}}|{{as|'''Total'''|ms}} [[Movement_speed#Movement_speed_caps|Uncapped]] {{as|Flat MS + {{pp|85 to 255}}|movement speed}}}} (''click to toggle''). The '''bonus''' movement speed from ''Biggest Snowball Ever!'' ignores the [[Movement_speed#Movement_speed_caps|movement speed cap]].

The snowball explodes upon colliding with an enemy {{tip|champion}}, {{tip|pet|large pet}}, medium-large {{tip|monster}} or terrain, dealing {{as|magic damage}} to surrounding enemies, increased by {{pp|type=charge time|key=%|0;0 to 400 for 5|0 to 5|formula=increases per frame after 1 second}}, {{tip|airborne|knocking them up}} for {{pp|type=charge time|0.5;0.5 to 0.75 for 5|0 to 5|formula=Increases per game tick after 1 second.}} seconds and subsequently {{tip|stun|stunning}} them for {{pp|type=charge time|0;0;0;0 to 0.5 for 9|0;1;2 to 5|formula=Increases per game tick after 2.33 seconds.}} seconds.
The snowball rolls over enemy {{tip|minion|minions}} and small monsters in its path, dealing {{fd|33.3}}% of the damage as {{as|magic damage}}.

After 10 seconds, or if the duo is {{tip|interrupt|interrupted}}, they will let loose the snowball, sending it rolling forward for an additional {{pp|type=charge time|750;750 to 1750 for 5|0 to 5|formula=increases per frame after 1 second}} units during which it will not grow any larger and will explode upon colliding with any enemy unit. ''Biggest Snowball Ever!'' can be recast after {{fd|0.5}} seconds.
w1.descriptionHtml:
Active: Willump breaks free of active slowing effects, becomes ghosted, gains a slightly larger field of view, and conjures a Unknown value: ccib Biggest Snowball Ever! Minimap.png snowball that he begins rolling in the direction of the cursor for up to 10 seconds, increasing in power over 5 seconds, while automatically navigating his movement. The snowball increases in size over the duration. Willump can also steer the snowball with a slow turn rate that increases over time; changing direction resets the turn rate.
The duo is slowed by 50% for the first 1 second, but is slow-immune* and keeps all increases in movement speed at time of cast for the duration of the charge. After a delay, the duo gain 14 movement speed every 0.25 seconds, up to the greater value between (click to toggle). The bonus movement speed from Biggest Snowball Ever! ignores the Movement_speed#Movement_speed_caps.
The snowball explodes upon colliding with an enemy champion, large pet, medium-large monster or terrain, dealing magic damage to surrounding enemies, increased by 0 to 5 ‒ undefined, knocking them up for 0 to 5 ‒ undefined seconds and subsequently stunning them for 0;1;2 to 5 ‒ undefined seconds.
The snowball rolls over enemy minions and small monsters in its path, dealing 33.3% of the damage as magic damage.
After 10 seconds, or if the duo is interrupted, they will let loose the snowball, sending it rolling forward for an additional 0 to 5 ‒ undefined units during which it will not grow any larger and will explode upon colliding with any enemy unit. Biggest Snowball Ever! can be recast after 0.5 seconds.
leveling: {{st|Minimum Explosion Damage|{{ap|36 to 72}} {{as|(+ 30% AP)}}|Maximum Explosion Damage|{{ap|36*5 to 72*5}} {{as|(+ {{ap|30*5}}% AP)}}}}
w1.notes:
*The initial cast and the manual recast count as ability activations for the purposes of on-cast effects such as {{nie|Spellblade}} and {{ai|Force Pulse|Kassadin}}.
* There are 3 stages where the turn rate increases from the original one:
** After turning for 1 second, the turn rate is increased to 175%.
** After turning for 3 seconds, the turn rate is increased to 250%.
** After turning for 6 seconds, the turn rate is increased to 325% where it caps.
* The time threshold to begin gaining bonus movement speed may be bugged, as Flat Bonus MS increases the time while % Bonus MS decreases the time.
** The formula appears to be (X ÷ 100) - Y, where:
*** X = '''Total''' Flat MS after caps
*** Y = {{fd|0.1}} per 1% %MS 
* The delay is not modified from its initially calculated value on-cast, even if additional movement speed is gained.
* '''Nunu and Willump's''' movement speed always increases in increments of ~14, regardless of which '''total''' value he will reach. This takes 6 increments to reach the '''Total''' MS + 85, but may take more to reach the Uncapped Flat + 85. Due to flat bonuses increasing the time threshold, it is possible for the ability's effects to end before reaching the '''total''' uncapped movement speed. 
* If '''Nunu''' turns continuously he will create a {{tt|600|Estimated}} unit circle, increased with '''bonus''' movement speed, striking the same point up to 3 times, for a maximum of {{as|{{ap|180|225|270|315|360}}|magic damage}} {{as|(+ 300% AP)}} {{as|magic damage}}. The damage can be further increased by detonating the snowball, for a '''total''' of {{as|{{ap|360|450|540|630|720}}|magic damage}} {{as|(+450% AP)}} {{as|magic damage}}.
* {{cai|Realm Warp|Ryze}} will only teleport '''Nunu and Willump''', leaving the {{ccib|Biggest Snowball Ever! Minimap.png||snowball}} behind.
* Hovering the cursor on the HUD (e.g [[Map (League of Legends)|mini map]] / champion portraits) does not affect the cast and steering of ''Biggest Snowball Ever!''.
* If the {{tip|slow}} has a {{tip|cripple}} effect within the same status effect, it will also be removed together with the ''slow'' upon activating ''Biggest Snowball Ever!''; e.g. {{cai|Wither|Nasus}}.
* ''Biggest Snowball Ever!'' is disabled for the first 15 seconds of the game.
* The following table refers for interactions while '''Nunu & Willump''' are {{tip|channel|channeling}}:
{{ct|channel|attack=false|move=Allowed, but cannot input movement commands.|cast=false|items=false|consume=false|spells=false|interrupts=death, ground, root, silence}}

effects.str:
• Minimum Explosion Damage: (+ 30% AP)
  • Maximum Explosion Damage: (+ % AP)

• Minimum Rollover Damage: (+ % AP)
  • Maximum Rollover Damage: (+ % AP)

e1.name: Snowball Barrage
description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Nunu''' swiftly throws a volley of 3 snowballs in the target direction over {{fd|0.4}} seconds, each snowball shattering upon hitting an enemy, dealing {{as|magic damage}} to enemies in a cone.

Enemies hit 3 times are {{tip|slow|slowed}} for 1 second. Champions and large monsters hit once are also ''Snowbound'' for 4 seconds, refreshing on each hit. ''Snowball Barrage'' can be recast twice within 3 seconds at no additional cost.
{{sbc|Recast:}} '''Nunu''' hurls another volley of snowballs, mimicking the first cast's effects. An enemy may only be {{tip|slow|slowed}} once for being hit by 3 snowballs.
After 3 seconds of the first cast, ''Snowbound'' enemies around '''Willump''' take {{as|magic damage}} and are {{tip|root|rooted}} for {{pp|0.5 to 1.5}} seconds.
e1.descriptionHtml:
Active: Nunu swiftly throws a volley of 3 snowballs in the target direction over 0.4 seconds, each snowball shattering upon hitting an enemy, dealing magic damage to enemies in a cone.
Enemies hit 3 times are slowed for 1 second. Champions and large monsters hit once are also Snowbound for 4 seconds, refreshing on each hit. Snowball Barrage can be recast twice within 3 seconds at no additional cost.
Recast: Nunu hurls another volley of snowballs, mimicking the first cast's effects. An enemy may only be slowed once for being hit by 3 snowballs.
After 3 seconds of the first cast, Snowbound enemies around Willump take magic damage and are rooted for 0.5undefined − 1.5undefined (based on level) seconds.
leveling: {{st|Damage Per Snowball|{{ap|16 to 48}} {{as|(+ 6% AP)}}|Damage Per Volley|{{ap|16*3 to 48*3}} {{as|(+ 18% AP)}}|Total Magic Damage|{{ap|16*3*3 to 48*3*3}} {{as|(+ 54% AP)}}}}
e1.notes:
*Both casts count as ability activations for the purposes of on-cast effects such as {{nie|Spellblade}} and stacking {{ai|Force Pulse|Kassadin}}.
** ''Snowbound'' consumption is not considered as an ability activation, nor does it proc {{ri|Conqueror}}.
* The three snowballs are thrown independently from one another over the {{fd|0.4}} seconds and their direction is determined from '''Nunu & Willump's''' position at any given moment.

effects.str:
• Damage Per Snowball: (+ 6% AP)
  • Damage Per Volley: (+ 18% AP)
  • Total Magic Damage: (+ 54% AP)

r1.name: Absolute Zero
description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Nunu''' and '''Willump''' start {{tip|channel|channeling}}, sapping heat from the surrounding area for 3 seconds, {{tip|slow|slowing}} enemies within by {{pp|type=channel time|key=%|0;50 to 95 for 11;95|0 to 3|formula=Increases by 4.5% every 0.25 seconds. ''Starts at 0.25 seconds and finishes at 2.75 seconds''}}, as well as gaining a {{tip|shield}}. The affected area is hidden if the duo is not {{tip|sight|visible}} to the enemy team. ''Absolute Zero'' can be recast after {{fd|0.5}} seconds.

At the end of the duration, or if the channel is {{tip|interrupt|interrupted}}, surrounding enemies take {{pp|key=%|type=channel time|changedisplay=true|0 to 100|0 to 3 by 1|formula=Increases the damage by 1% of its damage value every 0.03 seconds.}} of its damage as {{as|magic damage}}. Once the channel ends, affected enemies will remain {{tip|slow|slowed}} for {{pp|type=channel time|0 to 3 for 13|0 to 3}} seconds and any remaining shield will decay over 3 seconds.
r1.descriptionHtml:
Active: Nunu and Willump start channeling, sapping heat from the surrounding area for 3 seconds, slowing enemies within by 0 to 3 ‒ undefined, as well as gaining a shield. The affected area is hidden if the duo is not visible to the enemy team. Absolute Zero can be recast after 0.5 seconds.
At the end of the duration, or if the channel is interrupted, surrounding enemies take 0 to 3 by 1 ‒ undefined of its damage as magic damage. Once the channel ends, affected enemies will remain slowed for 0 to 3 ‒ undefined seconds and any remaining shield will decay over 3 seconds.
Recast: Nunu and Willump end the channel early.
r1.notes:
*The initial cast and the manual recast count as ability activations for the purposes of on-cast effects such as {{nie|Spellblade}} and {{ai|Force Pulse|Kassadin}}.
* While it's unlikely to happen normally, it is possible to deal zero damage with ''Absolute Zero'' if canceled as soon as it's started.
* The following table refers for interactions while '''Nunu & Willump''' are {{tip|channel|channeling}}:
{{ct|channel|cast=interrupts|items=interrupts,true,,false|spells=true,interrupts,interrupts,interrupts,interrupts}}

effects.str: • Shield: (+ 150% AP) (+ % bonus health)
